text: @realDonaldTrump "COVID19 Hotline. What's that you're saying - your coughing is making it hard to hear you. Can't breath? Feverish? Yeah sounds right. Well, all of our ventilators & beds are FULLY occupied. I can book you space 3 weeks from today, if you live that long, OK? Well have a good day!"
